omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
with records as (
	select
		PatientSer,
		ProcedureCode,
		ActualStartDateTime_s as Start_date,
		ActualEndDateTime_s as End_date
	from omop_staging.rtds_2a_attendances

	union

	select 
		PatientSer,
		ProcedureCode,
		Start_date,
		End_date
	from omop_staging.rtds_2b_plan
), records_with_patient as (
	select
		(select top 1 PatientId from omop_staging.rtds_1_demographics d where d.PatientSer = r.PatientSer) as PatientId,
		r.*
	from records r
)
select
	PatientId,
	ProcedureCode,
	Start_date as event_start_date,
	End_date as event_end_date
from records_with_patient
where PatientId is not null
	and patientid not like '%[^0-9]%'

omopColumns.name: procedure_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Maps concepts to standard valid concepts in the `procedure` domain.

omopColumns.name: procedure_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Resolve OPCS4 codes to OMOP concepts. If code cannot be mapped, map using the parent code.
